channel.title: How to make it so you can't teleport during a trade
channel.description:
Im wondering how can i add in a command to a 317 pi so you can't teleport while in a trade its to stop duping with out having to take out all the :: teleports.
Thanks in advance

item.title: How to make it so you can't teleport during a trade
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

could you do something like this?

if (c.inTrade) { c.canTeleport = false; c.sendMessage("You cannot teleport while in a trade."); return; }

Read full topic
item.source: How to make it so you can't teleport during a trade

item.title: How to make it so you can't teleport during a trade
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

When the trade method is called set a boolean to true for the trade, then in your teleporting methods have it check the boolean. If the boolean is true then the person cannot trade, if the boolean is false they can teleport.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make it so you can't teleport during a trade

item.title: How to make it so you can't teleport during a trade
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Add some kind of trade boolean that gets checked each time someone tries to teleport.

Read full topic
